juzs.text: keat ban pol tha dau che neah tae puok anak mean kechchakar avei ao banda anakneasar( mea la ai kat)
puokke chhlaey tha pitabrakd nasa puok yeung trauv ban ke banhchoun towkean krom del br pru td babakamm
daembi noam dom thm pi deiidth mk tomleak leu puokke
del chea sanhnhea mk pi mcheasa robsa anak( mou ham meat)samreab puok del bampean
haey yeung ban sangkroh banda anak mean chomnue del rsanow knong noh( phoumi robsa lout)
kraoyomk yeung minkheunh avei nowknong noh krawpi phteah muoy ampi banda anak mou slei m noh laey( phteah robsa lout ning krom kruosaear robsa keat)
haey yeung ban bansaoltouk nowknong phoumisrok noh nouv phosdo- tang muoy samreab banda anak del kaotakhlach tearounakamm da chhucheab
haey nowknong rueng mousaea nowpel del yeung ban banhchoun ke towkean hvie r aon cheamuoynung mou chi hsaa t da chbasaleasa( ka chea phosdo tang muoy der)
kraoyomk ke( hvie r aon) ban berchenh( pi chomnue)chea muoy nung kangtp robsa ke haey ban niyeay tha ke chea krou m nd akm ryy chea mnoussaavikl chrit
kraoyomk yeung ban krabuoch ke ning polteahean robsa ke ruoch yeung ka baoh puokke chaul tow knong samoutr daoy ke chea anak del trauv ke sdeibantosa
haey nowknong rueng ad nowpel del yeung ban banhchoun khyalpyouh da snguot tow kamtech puokke( ka chea phosdo tang muoy der)
vea min bansaoltouk avei laey pel del vea ban bk baok tow leu aveimuoy haey noh leuklengte vea thveu aoy avei teangnoh khe t ch khtei dauch chea pheh
haey nowknong rueng sa moud nowpel del mean ke niyeay towkean puokke tha chaur puok anak saoysokh rhautadl pelvelea muoy choh
te puokke ban brachheang nung batobanhchea nei mcheasa puokke . pel noh ronteah ban banh( samleab)puokke khn del puokke meulkheunh phtalnungophnek
dau che neah puokke kmean samotthaphap knong kar tatl( nung tearounakamm) laey haey puokke ka min ach chuoy khluoneng ban der
haey( yeung ban bamphlanh) krom nuo h moun puokke towtiet . pitabrakd nasa puokke kuchea krom del thleab lmeusa nung batobanhchea robsa a l laoh
haey mekh yeung ban bangkeut vea daoy anoupheap robsa yeung phtal . haey pitabrakd nasa yeung chea anak thveu aoy vea thom touleay
haey phendei yeung ban thveu aoy vea reabasmae . haey yeung chea anak kral vea yeang la braneit
haey real avei teangoasa yeung ban bangkeut aoy mean chea kou daembi puok anak nukkheunh( pi anoupheap robsa a l laoh)
dau che neah chaur puok anak branhab branhal tralbtow kan a l laoh( anouvotd tam batobanhchea)choh pitabrakd nasa khnhom chea anak dasatuen promean da chbasaleasa pi trong samreab puok anak
haey chaur puok anak kom yk mcheasa phe sa ng mk korp sakkar ruom cheamuoy a l laoh aoy saoh . pitabrakd nasa khnhom chea anak dasatuen promean da chbasaleasa pi trong samreab puok anak
dauchnaoh der kmean anakneasar na mneak del ban mokadl puok chomnean moun puokke krawpi puok noh ban niyeay tha ke chea krou m nd akm ryy chea mnoussaavikl chrit noh laey
tae puokke( puok chomnean moun) ban phdaphnhae knea ampi peakyasaamdei nih ryy? phtoytowvinh puokke kuchea krom del bampean
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) ber chenhpi puokke haey anak ka minmen chea anak del trauv ke sdeibantosa der
haey chaur anak romlukaknea choh proh kar romlukaknea noh pitchea phdal phalobrayoch dl banda anak del mean chomnue
haey yeung minban bangkeut chin ning mnoussa lok krawpi aoy puokke korp sakkar mk champoh yeung laey
yeung min trauvkar leaphosakkar pi puokke laey haey yeung ka min trauvkar aoy puokke phdal ahar dl yeung der
pitabrakd nasa a l laoh chea anak phdal leaphosakkar del mean anoupheap khlangokla cheatibamphot

haey pitabrakd nasa samreab puok del ban bampean ku ttuol chamnek tearounakamm dauchchea chamnek tearounakamm nei koukn robsa puokke der . dau che neah chaur komaoy puokke anteahsa som pi yeung aoy saoh
haey kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del brachheang nung thngai del puokke trauv ban ke sanyea
a l laoh sbath nung phnom tuo r
haey sbath nung kompir del trauv ban ke kttra
now leu sbek del leatatradeang
ning hpai te l meak mour( chhmoh kanleng muoy now leumekh chean ti brapir del mea la ai kat tvea hv)
ning dambaul delke leuk yeang khpasa( mekh nei piphoplok)
haeyning mhasamoutr del trauv ke bangkeatphleung( now thngai barlok)
pitabrakd nasa tearounakamm nei mcheasa robsa anak( mou ham meat) pitchea nung kaetlaeng
kmean anaknea mneak ach reareang vea ban laey
now thngai del mekh nung ronhchuoy yeang khlang
ning thngai del phnom rsat khchatkhchay( dauch popk)
dau che neah kar vineasa a nd reay now thngai noh ku samreab puok del phout kohk
ku puok del lengsaech nung brakear min troemotrauv
now thngai del puokke nung trauv ke rounh chaul tow knong nork cheu han nayea ng penhtomhoeng
(mean ke niyeay towkean puokke tha) nih haey chea nork del puok anak thleab ban bdeseth nung vea( nowknong lokey)
dau che neah tae( avei del puok anak kampoungte meulkheunh) nih chea m nd akm ryy? ryy muoy puok anak meul minkheunh

chaur puok anak chaul tow knong vea( nork) tohbeicha puok anak atthmot ryy min atthmot kadaoy ku vea dauch te knea te champoh puok anak . tampit ke kreante tabasnang aoy puok anak nouv avei del puok anak thleab br pru td bonnaoh
pitabrakd nasa banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh ku sthet knong thansuokr daoy sabbayrikreay
puokke sabbayrikreay nung avei del mcheasa robsa puokke ban bratan aoy puokke haey mcheasa robsa puokke karpar puokke pi tearounakamm nei nork cheu hi m
(mean ke niyeay towkean puokke tha) chaur puok anak briphok ning phoek daoy kdei rikreay cheamuoynung avei del puok anak thleab ban br pru td choh
daoy puokke phaek khluon now leu kre delke riebcham cheachuor . haey yeung rieb apa pipea aoy puokke cheamuoynung sreitepoabsaar

haey banda anak del mean chomnue ning kaunchaw robsa puokke del ban thveuteam puokke knong pheap mean chomnue noh yeung nung aoy kaunchaw robsa puokke now chuobchoum cheamuoy puokke( knong thansuokr) . haey yeung min thveu aoy phalbony nei ampeula robsa puokke khveah b ndi ch na laey . bokkol krob roub ku trauv ke phdal aoy tamosanyea nouv avei delke ban sang
haey yeung banthem dl puokke nouv phlechheu ning sach krob braphet tam avei del puokke trauvkar
puokke hoch kev sra aoy knea nowknong vea( thansuokr) del poum mean peakyasaamdei itabrayoch ning babakamm nowknong noh laey
haey ke m ng daerchoumvinh puokke samreab bamreu puokke ku brieb dauchchea kchkhyang del trauv ban ke theroksaa
haey puokke saamdaw tow rokaknea daoy suor knea towvinhtowmk
puokke ban niyeay tha pitabrakd nasa kalpimoun(now knong lokey) nowpel del puok yeung now cheamuoy krom kruosaear robsa puok yeung puok yeung thleab kaotakhlach a l laoh
haey a l laoh ban bratan nie k meat aoy puok yeung ning ban karpar puok yeung pi tearounakamm nei phleung nork
pitabrakd nasa puok yeung thleab korp sakkar champoh trong temuoyokt kalpimoun( nowknong lokey) . pitabrakd nasa trong mhakrounea mha anet sraleanh
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) romluk( mnoussa lok) proh daoysaar nie k meat nei mcheasa robsa anak anak minmen chea krouteay haeyka minmen chea mnoussaavikl chrit der
phtoytowvinh ‚Äè puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n) niyeay tha ke kuchea kvi mneak del puok yeung rngcham aoy sechakdeislab thleak leu roubke
chaur anak tb vinh tha chaur puok anak rngcha choh pitabrakd nasa khnhom ka sthet knongchamnaom anak del rngcham cheamuoy puok anak der
phtoytowvinh tae sate robsa puokke ban banhchea aoy puokke niyeay dau che neah ryy? ryy muoy ka puokke chea krom del bampean leu khuo l n eng
ryy muoy ka puokke niyeay tha anak( mou ham meat) ban bradit vea( kompir kuor an) daoyokhluoneng ryy? phtoytowvinh puokke te del kmean chomnue noh
dau che neah chaur aoy puokke noam yk peakyapech namuoy dauch nung peaky pech robsa vea( kompir kuor an)mk brasenbae puokke chea anak del niyeay pit noh
tae puokke trauv ban ke bangkeut daoy kmean anak bangkeut ryy? ryy muoy puokke chea anak del bangkeut khluoneng
tae puokke ban bangkeut mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei nih ryy? phtoytowvinh puokke kmean chomnue pitabrakd laey
ryy muoy puokke mean khleang leaphosakkar nei mcheasa robsa anak? ryy muoy puokke chea anakakrobkrong( avei teangoasa del meannow knong lokey nih)

tae puokke mean chondaer( laeng tow leumekh) ach aoy puokke sdablyy( peakyasaamdei robsa mea la ai kat) nowknong noh ryy? dau che neah chaur aoy anak del sdablyy knongchamnaom puokke noam phosdo tang da chbasaleasa mk
ryy muoy trong meankaun srei haey puok anak mean kaunobrosa
tae anak( mou ham meat) som kamrei pi puokke( champoh kar ampeav neav robsa anak) ruochamk puokke trauv ttuolobantouk thngonthngor pi kar chompeak bamnol( robsa anak) ryy
ryy muoy puokke doengpi rueng athrkambang haey puokke kttra vea touk( samreab brab dl mnoussa lok) ryy
ryy muoy puokke mean bamnng rieb phenkar baokabrasa(champoh mou ham meat)? te puok del ban brachheang te kuchea puok del ttuolorng nouv karbaokabrasa noh
ryy muoy puokke mean mcheasa del trauv korp sakkar phe sa ngpi a l laoh? a l laoh mha saatasam ampi avei del puokke thveu shi rik noh
haey brasenbae puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n) kheunh bamnek muoy ( nei tearounakamm) thleak pileu mekh puokke nung niyeay tha vea chea popk del phdom knea bonnaoh
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) baohbng puokke chaol rhaut teal te puokke ban chuobnung thngai robsa puokke( thngai barlok) del now thngai noh puokke nung trauv vineasa a nd reay
kuchea thngai del ubayokl robsa puokke min ach karpar avei dl puokke ban laey haey puokke ka kmean anak chuoy der
haey pitabrakd nasa puok del ban bampean ku trauv ttuol tearounakamm phe sa ng pi noh tiet( nowknong lokey) . kabonde puokke pheakochraen mindoeng laey

haey chaur anak( mou ham meat) atthmot nung batobanhchea nei mcheasa robsa anak proh chea karpit nasa anak sthetnow kraom kar khleameul robsa yeung . haey chaur anak leukatamkeung daoy sarsaer champoh mcheasa robsa anak nowpel del anak kraok( pi damnek thvayobangkoum)
haey muoy phnek nei peloyb chaur anak leukatamkeung trong ning nowpel del hvaung tara lich( pel tiebaphlu)
a l laoh sbath nung phkay nowpel vea lich bat
(mou ham meat) mi td phokde robsa puok anak minban v nge vng ning minban pheanchralam laey
haey ke ka min niyeay tam tomneung chetd der
vea( peakyasaamdei delke niyeay) kmeanoavei krawpi vea hi del trauv ke vea hi mk noh laey
anak del mean kamleang khlangokla( chi pri l) ban bangrien ke
del mean lokkhan laitakhchaoh ning ban bangheanh roubreang pit
daoy ke( chi pri l) sthetnow e cheungmekh da khpasa bamphot
banteabmk ke ban mk chit( mou ham meat) ning kante chit them tiet
haey( kar chit nih) ku mean braveng rveang chong teangpir nei thnou ryyka chit cheang nih towtiet
ruoch trong ban phdal vea hi aoy khnhom robsa trong( mou ham meat) nouv avei del trong ban vea hi
chetd robsa ke( mou ham meat) minban phout kohk nouv avei delke bankheunh laey
dau che neah tae puok anak bdeseth nung ke champoh avei delke kheunh ryy
haey chea karpit nasa ke bankheunh chi pri l chea thmei mdongtiet
now e set r tol moun ta ha( now chong b pea ch b nei mekh chean ti brapir)
nowkanleng noh mean thansuokr meak vea
nowpel del( ponlu robsa a l laoh ning banda mea la ai- kat) krobadandab leu set r tol moun ta ha nouv avei del krobadandab
khnnoh ke( mou ham meat) minban ngeak meul( che v ng sda) ning minban bampean laey
chea karpit nasa ke bankheunh phosdo tang da thom muoychamnuon nei mcheasa robsa ke
tae puok anak( puok mou sh ri ki n) yl yeangna champoh roub saamnak chhmoh lat ning aou sa hsaa
haeyning mea nat del chea roubsaamnak tibei phe sa ng tiet noh ( tae vea phdal phalobrayoch ryy bangk krohthnak dl puok anak ryyte)
tae puok anak meankaun brosa haey trong mean kaunosrei ryy
bae dauchnaoh men noh kuchea karbengchek muoy da a you tde thmr bamphot

vea teangnoh kmean ei v krawpi chhmoh del puok anak ning chidaun chitea robsa puok anak ban dakchhmoh aoy puokvea noh laey . a l laoh minban banhchouh phosdo tang namuoy samreab( aoy puok anak korp sakkar) vea laey . puokke min thveuteam avei krawpi karosman ning tam tomneung chetd laey . haey chea pit nasa kar changaoulobangheanh pi mcheasa robsa puokke pitchea ban mokadl puokke
tae mnoussa lok ttuol ban avei delke bngobrathnea ryy
(min dau che neah laey) proh kechchakar thngai barlok ning lokey kuchea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh

haey mean mea la ai kat cheachraen now leumekh cheachraen chean del kar a nd reak m robsa puokke min ach phdal brayochavei laey leuklengte banteabpi a l laoh anounhnhat aoy anaknea del trong mean chetnea ning ylprom bonnaoh
pitabrakd nasa puok del kmean chomnue nung thngai barlok puok ke nung dakchhmoh aoy mea la ai kat chea chhmoh srei
daoy puokke poum mean chamnehdoeng pi vea laey . puokke min thveu tam avei krawpi karosman noh laey . haey pitabrakd nasa kar sman min ach phdal phalobrayoch avei dl karpit laey
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) chiesa aoy chhngay pi anak del ber chenhpi kar romluk( kompir kuor an) robsa yeung haey ke min chngban avei krawpi karorsanow knong lokey nih laey

noh haey kuchea kamrit yldoeng robsa puokke . pitabrakd nasa mcheasa robsa anak( mou ham meat) trong doeng bamphot champoh anaknea del ban v nge v ng pi meakra robsa trong . haey trong ka doeng bamphot der champoh anaknea del ttuol ban kar changaoulobangheanh

haey avei del now leumekh cheachraen chean ning avei del now leu phendei kuchea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh del trong nung tabasnang champoh puok del ban br pru td babakamm aoy sam tow nung avei del puokke ban br pru td . haey trong nung tabasnang champoh banda anak del ban sang ampeula nouv phalbony da laobrapei( thansuokr)

banda anak del chiesaveang pi babakamm thom ning ampeu a seil- thmr phe sa ng krawpi babakamm tauchtach noh pitabrakd nasa mcheasa robsa anak kuchea anak toulomtouleay knong kar aphytosa . trong doeng bamphot pi lokkhan robsa puok anak khn del trong ban bangkeut puok anak pi dei ning nowpel puok anakchea teark nowknong poh mdeay robsa puok anak . dau che neah chaur puok anak kom mean motonpheap champoh khluoneng tha chea anak saatasam aoy saoh proh trong doeng bamphot champoh anak del kaotakhlach trong
dau che neah tae anak( mou ham meat) min bankheunh anak del ban berchenh( pi kompir kuor an)
ning ban brichcheak tropy sa mb tde khleah ruochamk kaban phdach vinh te ryy
tae ke mean chamnehdoeng nei brakear athrkambang haey ke ach meulkheunh phtalnungophnek ryy
ryy muoy ke min trauv ban ke brab nouv avei del mean nowknong kompir robsa mou sa
ning kompir robsa ai pr hi m del ban bampenh karneiykechch te ryy
daembi komaoy anak del sang babakamm ttuolobantouk champoh babakamm robsa anakadtei
haey samreab mnoussa lok min ttuol ban krawpi avei del khluon ke ban broengobreng thveu noh laey
haey pitabrakd nasa kar broengobreng robsa ke nung trauv ke bangheanh aoy kheunh( now thngai barlok)
banteabmk trong nung tabasnang aoy ke vinh nouv kar tabasnang muoy yeang penhlenh
haey pitabrakd nasa ti b pea ch b nei avei teangoasa ku vil tralbtow rk mcheasa robsa anak( mou ham meat) vinh
haey pitabrakd nasa trong chea anak del thveu aoy( krobknea) saech ning thveu aoy yom
haey pitabrakd nasa trong chea anak del thveu aoy slab ning thveu aoy rsa
haey pitabrakd nasa trong ban bangkeut aoy mean kou mean brosa ning srei nhi ning chhmol
ampi tukkeam nowpel del trauv ke banh chaul tow knong sbaun
haey pitabrakd nasa kar bangkeut sachathmei mdongtiet kuchea katapvokechch robsa trong
haey pitabrakd nasa trong chea anak thveu aoy mean ning thveu aoy krobkrean
haey pitabrakd nasa trong chea mcheasa krobkrong phkay shie k r
haey pitabrakd nasa trong ban bamphlanh krom a d mounke
ning krom sa mou d . haey trong minban bansaoltouk anaknea mneak laey
haey( trong ban bamphlanh) krom nuo h kalpimoun . pitabrakd nasa puokke kuchea puok del thleab ban bampean ning rungrousa bamphot
ning phoumi mou ta hvei kasa( phoumi robsa krom robsa lout) del trong ban bamphlanh( thveu aoy kraleab pi leu chohkraom)
haey trong ban krobadandab phoumi noh nouv avei( tearounakamm ampi thm phleung) del ban krobadandab
dau che neah tae nie k meat nei mcheasa robsa anak namuoy del anak now sangsay noh
nih( mou ham meat) kuchea anak dasatuen promean mneak knong chamnaom anak dasatuen promean moun
thngai barlok khet kante chit haey
kmean anaknea doengpi vea krawpi a l laoh laey
dau che neah tae puok anak nguengochhngal champoh peakyasaamdei( kompir kuor an) nih ryy
haey puok anak neaknea saechchamak( champoh kompir kuor an) haey puok anak min yom( daoy karphyokhlach tearounakamm del ban riebreab now knong vea) te ryy
khn del puok anak prongeuy k ndeu y ngeak chenh( pi kompir kuor an) noh
dau che neah chaur puok anak saou chout ning korp sakkar champoh a l laoh choh
kalkamnt nei thngai barlok chit mokadl haey preah chnt ka ban bek chea pir der
te tohbeicha puokke bankheunh mou chi hsaa t kadaoy ka puokke nowte ngeak chenh haey niyeay tha nih kuchea m nd akm da chbasa leasa der
haey puokke themtang ban bdeseth ning thveuteamchamnng robsa puokke tiet phng . haey real kechchakar teangoasa ku mean karkamnt
haey chea karpit nasa damnoeng muoychamnuon( robsa puok chomnean moun) ban mokadl puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n) del nowknong noh meankar hamkhat krobkrean( pi pheap kmean chomnue robsa puokke)
kompir kuor an kuchea ktebandet da krobkrean( knong kardasatuen promean) te kardasatuen promean teangnoh min phdal phalobrayoch avei( dl puokke) laey
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) ber chenhpi puokke . ( chaur changcha) now thngai del mea la ai kat srekhaw( puokke) aoy towkean kanleng chomnoumchomreah del chea hetokar muoy da ronthot
daoy phnek robsa puokke tomleak choh khn del puokke chenhpi phnaur puokke hakdauchchea satv kandaub del now reay peasapenh leu phtaidei
daoy puokke branhab branhal chhpaoh towkean anak del srekhaw . puok del brachheang ban niyeay tha thngainih kuchea thngai del lombak vetnea bamphot
krom nuo h ban bdeseth moun puokke( areab kou r sh) haey puok ke ban bdeseth nung khnhom robsa yeung( nuo h) ning ban niyeay tha ke chea mnoussaavikl chrit haey ke trauv ban ke koumream themtiet
pelnoh ke( nuo h) kaban buongsuong som pi mcheasa robsa ke tha pitabrakd nasa khnhom asamotthaphap haey dau che neah saum trong me tda chuoy dl khnhom phng
dau che neah yeung kaban baekatvear mekh daoy banghourtuk phlieng cheachraen
haey yeung ban thveu aoy phendei b po ch nh nouv braphp tukchea chraen pelnoh tuk kaban chuobaknea( tukathleak pileu mekh ning tuk del chenh pi dei) towteam phenkar delke ban kamnt da pitabrakd
haey yeung ban sangkroh ke aoy chiah leu saampow del thveuampi kdar ning dekkol
del vea thveudamnaer tam kar khleameul robsa yeung kuchea kar tabasnang champoh anak del trauv ban ke brachheang( nuo h)

haey chea karpit nasa yeung ban bansaoltouk vea(rueng robsa nuo h) chea phosdo tang muoy( banhcheak pi samotthaphap robsa yeung samreab mnoussa lok) . dau che neah tae mean anaknea yk thveuchea merien der ryyte
dau che neah tae tearounakamm robsa yeung ning karopromean robsa yeung yeang dauch me d ch der
haey pitabrakd nasa yeung ban thveu aoy kompir kuor an mean kar ngeayosruol samreab kar changcham . dau che neah tae mean anak del yk thveu chea merien der ryyte
krom a d ban bdeseth( nung anakneasar robsa puokke) . dau che neah tae tearounakamm robsa yeung ning karopromean robsa yeung yeangdauch me d ch der
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban banhchoun khyalpyouh da trachak bk baok towleu puokke yeang khlang now thngai m h nd reay chea b nd banteab
khyalpyouh ban kuoch yk mnoussaalok puokke hakbeidauchchea kl lmeu del r leung chenhpi dei
dau che neah tae tearounakamm robsa yeung ning karopromean robsa yeung yeang dauch me d ch der
haey pitabrakd nasa yeung ban thveu aoy kompir kuor an mean kar ngeayosruol samreab kar changcham . dau che neah tae mean anak del yk thveu chea merien der ryyte
krom sa mou d ban bdeseth nung kardasatuen promean
haey puokke ban niyeay tha tae puok yeung tam ke del chea mnoussa mneak knongchamnaom puok yeung ryy? bae dauchnaoh men puok yeung pitchea sthet knong pheap v nge vng ning vikalochrit cheaminkhan
tae ke banhchouh vea hi aoy ke( sa leh) daoy romlng puok yeung ryy? phtoytowvinh ke chea mnoussa phout kohk ning amnuot ke a ng kaang
puokke kngte nung doeng now thngaikheangmoukh( thngai barlok) tha anaknea chea anak phout kohk ning chea anak del uotang noh
pitabrakd nasa yeung chea anak del banhchoun satv audth nhi muoy kbal( chenhpi thm) daembi chea karsaakalbong puokke . dau che neah chaur anak rngcham meul puokke ning atthmot choh

haey chaur anak brab puokke tha pitabrakd nasa tuk ( andaung) noh ku trauv ban ke bengchek rveang puokke( muoyothngai samreab satv audth muoyothngai samreab puokke) . real pel trauv phoek ku trauv mk tam ven
te( puokke min sokh chetd) puokke ban haw mi td phokde robsa puok ke mneak haey ke ban yk dav ruoch ka saamleh satv audth noh
dau che neah tae tearounakamm ning karopromean robsa yeung yeangdauch me d ch der
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban banhchoun samrek muoy yeang khlang towleu puokke pelnoh puokke brieb dauchchea roukkhcheate snguot delke dak knong kraol samreab satvapahn sai
haey pitabrakd nasa yeung ban thveu aoy kompir kuor an mean kar ngeayosruol samreab kar changcham . dau che neah tae mean anak del yk thveu chea merien der ryyte
krom robsa lout ban bdeseth nung kardasatuen promean

pitabrakd nasa yeung ban banhchoun khyalpyouh noam dom thm tomleak leu puokke teangoasa leuklengte krom kruosaear robsa lout( anak del ruom chomnue cheamuoy keat)bonnaoh del yeung ban sangkroh puokke now velea moun tiebaphlu
chea nie k meat pi yeung . dauchnaoh der yeung tabasnang champoh anaknea del ban doengkoun
haey chea karpit nasa ke( lout) ban dasatuen promean puokke pi tondakamm robsa yeung te puokke bercha bdeseth nung kar dasatuen promean noh towvinh

haey chea karpit nasa puokke ban luonglom ke( lout) som kar ruomrk cheamuoy phnhiev robsa ke . kraoyomk yeung thveu aoy phnek robsa puokke ngngut haey( yeung ban mean bantoul towkean puokke tha) chaur puok anak phloksa nouv tearounakamm ning karopromean robsa yeung choh
haey chea karpit nasa tearounakamm chea ni r nd ban thleak leu puokke teang prukaproheam
dau che neah chaur puokke phloksa tearounakamm ning karopromean robsa yeung choh
haey pitabrakd nasa yeung ban thveu aoy kompir kuor an mean kar ngeayosruol samreab kar changcham . dau che neah tae mean anak del yk thveuchea merien der ryyte
haey chea karpit nasa kardasatuen promean ban mokadl vongsaotrakaul robsa hvie r aon
puokke ban bdeseth nung phosdo tang robsa yeung teangoasa . haey yeung ban dak tearounakamm puokke nouv tearounakamm robsa anak del mha khlangokla mha mean anoupheap
tae kar brachheang robsa puok anak( areab kou r sh) brasaer cheang puok brachheang moun ryy muoy ka puok anak meankar theanea( aoy ruochphot pi tearoun- kamm robsa a l laoh) nowknong kompir moun ryy
ryy muoy puokke niyeay tha puok yeung teangoasaknea kuchea anak chhneah
puokke teangoasa nung trauv breachy haey rt tralb kraoy cheaminkhan
phtoytowvinh kalkamnt nei thngai barlok kuchea karosanyea ( thveutearounakamm)puokke haey kalkamnt nei thngai barlok ku chhucheab ning lvingchourocht bamphot
pitabrakd nasa puok del br pru td babakamm ku sthet knong pheap v nge vng ning sthet knong nork del chabcheh santhosanthow
now thngai del puokke trauv ke ausa phkabmoukh tow knong nork . ( mean ke niyeay towkean puokke tha) chaur puok anak phloksa nouv rosacheate nei phleung nork nih choh
pitabrakd nasa real avei teangoasa yeung ban bangkeut vea daoy mean kamnt ruoch chea se r ch
haey batobanhchea robsa yeung( towkean aveimuoy) ku kreante yeung pol peakyamuoymeat( vea nung kaetlaeng phleam)dauchchea muoy bbrechaphnek bonnaoh
haey chea karpit nasa yeung ban bamphlanh puok del ban brachheang dauch puok anak . dau che neah tae mean anaknea yk thveuchea merien der ryyte
haey real avei del puokke ban br pru td vea ku sthetnow knong sievphow kamntheto( lav ho l mah hvou sa)
haey real kechchakar tauch ning thom ku trauv ke kttra
pitabrakd nasa banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh ku sthetnow knong thansuokr ning mean t ne l cheachraen
del sthetnow kanleng sachch kber mcheasa del meanamnach mean anoupheap bamphot
a l laoh mha sabborsa
trong ban bangrien kompir kuor an( dl mnoussa lok)
trong ban bangkeut mnoussa lok
trong ban bangrien ke aoy cheh briyay sapvobebyeang
preahatity ning preah chnt thveudamnaer tam karkamnt da cheak leak
haey roukkhcheate ning daemchheu neanea saou chout( champoh a l laoh)
haey mekh trong ban leuk vea aoy khpasa haey trong ban bangkeut aoy mean pheap you tde thmr( now leu phendei)
daembi komaoy puok anak bampean leu pheap you tde thmr noh
haey chaur puok anak brate b tde knong kar thloeng aoy ban troemotrauv haey kom thveu aoy khveah phnekachonhching aoy saoh
haey phendei trong ban bangkeut vea( reabasmae) samreab satv lok
daoy now leu vea mean phlechheu ning daem lmeu del mean changkom phle cheachraen
ning kreabthonhnhocheate del mean saambk promteang roukkhcheate del mean klenokraaub
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
trong ban bangkeut mnoussa lok( a da) pi deiidth snguot dauchchea dei delke saun chea saamphear
haey trong ban bangkeut chin ampi andataphleung
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
(a l laoh) chea mcheasa kanleng teangpir nei preahatity reah ( pel rdauvokdaw ning rdauvornga) ning chea mcheasa kanleng teangpir nei preah atity lich( pel rdauvokdaw ning rdauvornga)
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
trong ban thveu aoy samoutr pir( tuksaeab ning tukabrai) chuobaknea
now rveang vea teangpir mean rneang khand min aoy chreabchaul knea
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
kchkhyang ning phkathm chenhpi vea teangpir( samoutr tuksaeab ning tukabrai)
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
haey neavea thom del thveudamnaer now leu phtaisamoutr hak dauchchea phnom noh kuchea kammosetthi robsa trong
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
vi teangoasa now leu phendei nung vineasa a nd reay
haey vng ph kd r nei mcheasa robsa anak( mou ham meat) del mha khpangkhpasa ning mha thkomthkaeng temuoyokt del now kngvongsa chea amt
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
anak del now leumekh cheachraen chean nung phendei tengte buongsuong som pi trong . trong riebcham kechchakar robsa trong chea riengrealthngai
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
yeung nung thveukear touteat puok anak teangoasa ao mnoussaalok ning chin
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh

ao banda chin ning mnoussa lok. brasenbae puok anakmean samotthaphap ach thveudamnaer chhlangkat krobtisati nei mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei chaur puok anak chhlangkat choh . puok anak min ach thveudamnaer chhlang kat ban laey leuklengte mean karoanounhnhat( pi yeung)
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
mean ke banhchoun andataphleung ning lohtheato romleay tow dot ke teangpir( mnoussaalok ning chin) haey ke teangpir min ach reareang ban laey
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
nowpel del mekh be reah bek( now thngai barlok) ku vea mean pnrkrahm phka kau leab dauchchea be r ng del kampoung pouh
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
haey now thngai noh mnoussaalok ning chin min trauv ke suor ampi babakamm robsa ke laey
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh

puok del sang babakamm nung trauv ke skal tamory sanhnhea saamkeal robsa puokke( mean pnrkhmaw now leu phtaimoukh) haey puokke trauv ke chab sak bangheuy ning cheung( baoh kroveng chaul tow knong nork)
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
nih kuchea nork cheu han nam del puok br pru td babakamm bdeseth nung vea
puokke vilovl rveang nork cheu han nam ning tuk kdaw del pouh yeang khlang
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
haey samreab anaknea del ban kaotakhlach nowpel brachhommoukh champoh mcheasa robsa ke( daembi katsechakdei) ku ttuol ban thansuokr pir
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
(thansuokr teangpir noh) mean mekchheu del mean phle krob braphet
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
nowknong thansuokr teangpir noh tiet mean braphp tuk pir haur
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
nowknong noh tiet der mean phlechheu krob braphet chea kou
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
puokke angkouyophaek khluon now leu pouk del kraloprom am thveu pi sautr krasa . haey phlechheu nei thansuokr teangpir noh ku now kber puokke
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh

now leu pouk noh mean sreitepoabsaar cheachraen del min samlung meul anaknea phe sa ng krawpi svami robsa puok neang laey del kmean mnoussa lok ning chin na thleab bahpeal puok neang pimoun puokke( svami) laey
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
samrosa robsa puok neang hakdauchchea tbaungottum ning phkathm
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
kmean kar tabasnang champoh ampeula krawpi ampeula noh laey
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
haey krawpi thansuokr teangpir nih mean thansuokr pir phe sang tiet
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
thansuokr teangpir noh mean pnrbaitng chasa
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
nowknong thansuokr teangpir noh mean braphp tuk pir banh tuk chenh( kmeanochhbchhr)
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
nowknong thansuokr teangpir noh tiet mean phlechheu krob braphet ning phle lmeu haeyning phle ttum
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
nowknong thansuokr teangnoh mean sreitepoabsaar kroblokkha saa t cheachraen
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
ku banda sreitepoabsaar del trauv ban ke theroksaa daoy kng vongsa nowknong ponlea
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
del kmean mnoussaalok ning chin na thleab bahpeal puok neang pimoun puokke( svami) laey
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
daoy puokke angkouyophaek now leu khnaey del mean sraom pnrbaitng promteang kam real prom da la braneit
dau che neah tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
mha mean porchy neam nei mcheasa robsa anak del mean pheap khpangkhpasa ning thkomthkaeng
nowpel del pru tde kar thngai barlok ban kaetlaeng
kmean anaknea mneak ach bdeseth nung pru tde kar robsa vea ban laey
pru tde kar noh nung tomleak anakakhleah( tow knong nork) ning leuk kampsa anakakhleah( nowknong thansuokr)
nowpel del phendei trauv ke thveu aoy ronhchuoy yeang khlang
haey banda phnom trauv ban ke bambek khe t ch khtei
haey vea ban klaycha thouli del rsat tam khyal
haey puok anak nung klaytowchea bei krom
ku krom( del ttuol banhchi daoy) daisdam . saamnang avei mlih champoh krom daisdam noh.( puokke nung chaul thansuokr)
ning krom( del ttuol banhchi daoy) dai che v ng . aphpv avei mlih champoh krom dai che v ng noh.( puokke nung chaul thanonork)
haeyning krom del neamoukh ke( knong kar sang ampeula now knong lokey) krom noh haeynung neamoukh ke( chaul thansuokr now thngai barlok)
anak teangnoh haey chea anak del now chit nung a l laoh bamphot
ku nowknong thansuokr na ai m
puokke pheakochraen chea anak chomnean moun
haey puokke pheaktech chea anak chomnean kraoy
(puokke) now leu kre del thveu ampi measa ning tbaungpechr da meanotamlei
daoy puokke angkouyophaek bermoukh tl knea now leu kre noh
haey ke m ng del now vy ke m ng chea amt daerchoumvinh ( samreab bamreu) puokke
cheamuoynung peng ning kamsiev haeyning kev sra mk pi t ne l sra del haur( nowknong thansuokr)
daoy puokke kmean a kar chhukbeal haeyka min batbng smartei daoysaar sra noh der
ning phlechheu cheachraen tam del puokke ach chreusareusa
ning sach baksaei cheachraen tam te avei del puokke trauvkar
haeyning sreitepoabsaar daoy mean phnek srasa saat
brieb ban dauchchea kchkhyang delke theroksaa touk yeang la
teangnih kuchea kar tabasnang champoh avei del puokke thleab ban sang
nowknong vea( thansuokr) puokke minlyy peakyasaamdei del it brayoch laey haeyka minlyy peakyasaamdei del noam aoy mean babakamm der
meante peaky chounopr knea au serisuosdei serisuosdei ao tebonnaoh
haey krom( del ttuol banhchi daoy) daisdam . saamnang avei mlih champoh krom daisdam noh.( puokke nung chaul thansuokr)
puokke now rveang daem poutrea del kmean banlea
ning daemchek del mean phle truot leu knea
ning kraomomlob del amt
ning tuk del haur it chhbchhr
ning phlechheu yeang chraen
del min cheh asa haeyka kmean kar hamkhat( pi kar ttuoltean phlechheu noh) der
ning pouk cheachraen del khpasa now leu kre
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban bangkeut puok neang( srei knong thansuokr) nouv kar bangkeut muoy( khosapi kar bangkeut nowknong lokey)
haey yeung ban thveu aoy puok neang now kramoum prohmcheari rhaut
del sraleanh te svami robsa puok neang bonnaoh ning mean ayou smae knea
(yeung ban bangkeut puok neang) ku samreab te krom(del ttuol banhchi daoy) daisdam
puokke pheakochraen chea anak chomnean moun
haey puokke pheakochraen chea anak chomnean kraoy
haey krom( del ttuol banhchi daoy) dai che v ng . a phai avei mlih champoh krom dai che v ng noh.( puokke nung chaul thanonork)
ku sthetnow knong chamhay nei phleung nork ning tukpouh da sen kdaw
ning mlob ampi phsaengophleung nork da khmaw ngngut
del min trachak haeyka min sokh sruol der
pitabrakd nasa puokke kalpimoun noh thleab chea anak del meanotropy sa mb tde sdokasdamph
haey puokke thleab ban br pru td ampeubeab da thomtheng(ampeu shi ri k) cheanichch
haey puokke thleab niyeay tha tae nowpel del puok yeung slab haey puok yeung ban klaytowchea dei ning chhaoeng haey noh puok yeung pitchea trauv ke thveu aoy rsa chenhpi phnaur laengvinh men ryy
tae themtang chidaunchitea robsa yeung kalpimoun der ryy
chaur anak( mou ham meat) tb tha pitabrakd nasa ku teang anak chomnean moun ning anak chomnean kraoy
nung trauv ke bramoulophdom teangoasa nowpel muoy nei thngai delke ban kamnt yeang chbasa( thngai barlok)
kraoyomk pitabrakd nasa puok anak ao puok v nge v ng. puok del bdeseth( nung thngai barlok)
puok anak nung sai nouv daem hsaoe k kou m
rhaut tealte penhpoh ampi vea
ruochamk puok anak nung phoektuk pouh da sen kdaw
haey puok anak phoek dauch satv audth del se r k khlean bamphot
nih chea kar svakom robsa puokke now thngai chomnoumchomreah
yeung chea anak del ban bangkeut puok anak hetoaveibeanchea puok anak min chue( pi kar rsa laengvinh)
dau che neah chaur puok anak brab yeung ampi tukkeam del puok anak banh chaul tow knong sbaun sdrei noh meul
tae puok anakchea anak bangkeut vea( aoy tow chea mnoussa) ryy muoy yeung chea anak bangkeut
yeung ban kamnt se ch kei d slab rveang puok anak haey yeung min men chea anak del kmean samotthaphap noh laey
champoh kar chomnuosa( anak phe sa ng) dauch puok anak ning bangkeut puok anak ( sachathmei) knong lokkhan muoy phe sa ng tiet del puok anak mindoeng
haey chea karpit nasa puok anak ban doeng nouv karobangkeut dambaung . dau che neah hetoaveibeanchea puok anak min nukkheunh
dau che neah chaur puok anak brab yeung mk nouv avei( kreabpouch)del puok anak dam noh
tae puok anakchea anak bandoh vea ryy muoy yeung chea anak bandoh
brasenbae yeung mean chetnea yeung pitchea nung thveu vea aoy klay chea snguot khe t ch khtei . pelnoh puok anak ban klaycha nguengochhngal
(daoy niyeay tha) pitabrakd nasa puok yeung ku nung trauv khatabng
phtoytowvinh puok yeung min trauv ban ke phdal( leaphosakkar) laey
dau che neah chaur puok anak brab yeung nouv tuk del puok anakattuol tean noh mk
tae puok anak ban banhchouh vea pi popk ryy muoy yeung chea anak banhchouh
brasenbae yeung mean chetnea yeung nung thveu vea aoy klaytowchea brai lving . dau che neah hetoaveibeanchea puok anak mindoeng koun
tae puok anak minkheunh phleung del puok anak bangkeat noh te ryy
tae puok anak ban bangkeut daemchheu( daembi bangkeat)vea ryymuoy yeung chea anak bangkeut
yeung ban bangkeut vea chea kar romluk( dl puok anak champoh phleung nork) ning chea brayoch samreab banda anak del thveudamnaer
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) leukatamkeung daoy romluk neam nei mcheasa robsa anak mha utdongk utdam
haey yeung sbath nung kanleng kochr nei hvaung tara teangoasa
haey pitabrakd nasa vea kuchea kar sbath muoy da thom brasen bae puok anakdoeng
pitabrakd nasa vea kuchea kompir kuor an da mha thkomthkaeng
delke roksaatouk nowknong kompir( lav ho l mah hvou sa)
kmean anaknea mneak bahpeal vea ban laey leuklengte banda anak del chreah saat bonnaoh
kar banhchouh( kompir kuor an) nih mk pi mcheasa del krobkrong nei piphp teangoasa
dau che neah tae puok anak( puok mou sh ri ki n) han bdeseth nung kompir kuor an nih ryy
haey puok anak ban yk leaphosakkar robsa puok anak(del a l laoh bratan aoy) thveuchea kar brachheang ryy
hetoaveibeanchea puok anak min( thveu aoy chivit tralbmokvinh) nowpel del vea ban chenh mokadl bampngk
khn del puok anak kampoung samlung meul noh
daoy mea la ai kat robsa yeung now chit ke cheang puok anak tow tiet kabonde puok anak meul minkheunh laey
dau che neah brasenbae puok anak thleab kitthea kmean kar chomnoumchomreah te noh hetoaveibeanchea
puok anak min thveu aoy vea chaul tow knong khluon vinh brasenbae puok anak chea anak del niyeay pit noh
haey brasenbae anak del slab noh chit nung a l laoh
kdei me tda krounea ning leaphosakkar da laobrapei haeyning thansuokr na ai m( ku samreab puokke)
haey brasenbae ke( anak del slab) sthet knongchamnaom krom ( del ttuol banhchi daoy) daisdam vinh
(mean ke niyeay towkean anak noh tha) saum sokh sa ndi pheap kaetmean champoh anak del sthet knongchamnaom krom( del ttuol banhchi daoy) daisdam
te brasenbae ke sthet knongchamnaom puok del bdeseth del v nge v ng vinh noh
kar svakom( champoh ke) ku tukpouh da kdaw bamphot
haey trauv ke dot knong phleung nork cheu hi m
pitabrakd nasa nih kuchea rueng pit yeang cheakchbasa
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) leukatamkeung daoy romluk neam nei mcheasa robsa anak da mha utdongk utdam
avei del now leumekh cheachraen chean ning phendei ban leuk tamkeung champoh a l laoh daoy trong mha khlangpouke mha ktebandet
amnach krobkrong mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei kuchea kammosetthi robsa trong temuoyokt daoy trong thveu aoy rsa ning thveu aoy slab . haey trong mean anoupheap leu avei teangoasa

trong kuchea anak del dambaung ke bangaosa ning chea anak chongokraoy ke bangaosa haeyning chea anak del khpasa cheangke bamphot promteang chea anak chit cheangke bamphot . haey trong mha doeng nouv real avei teangoasa

trong chea anak del ban bangkeut mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei knong rypel bramuoy thngai banteabmk trong now leu a r sh . trong doeng nouv avei del chaul tow knong dei ning avei del chenhpi vea haeyning avei del choh pileu mekh promteang avei del laeng towleu vea . haey trong now cheamuoy puok anak tohbeicha puok anak now ti nakadaoy . haey a l laoh kheunh bamphot nouv avei del puok anak br pru td
amnach krobkrong mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei kuchea kammosetthi robsa trong . haey kechchakar teangoasa nung trauv vilotralb towkean a l laoh temuoyokt
trong chea anak banhchoul peloyb tow knong pelothngai haey trong ka chea anak banhchoul pelothngai tow knong peloyb vinh der . haey trong doeng bamphot nouv avei del mean nowknong chetd

chaur puok anak( mnoussa lok) mean chomnue leu a l laoh ning anakneasar robsa trong . haey chaur puok anak chamnay nouv avei del trong ban bratan aoy puok anakchea anakakrobkrong vea . haey banda anak del mean chomnue knongchamnaom puok anak ning ban chamnay nouv tropy sa mb tde noh puokke nung ttuol ban phalbony da thomtheng

tae hetoaveibeanchea puok anak kmean chomnue leu a l laoh khn del anakneasar( mou ham meat) ampeavneav puok anak daembi aoy puok anak mean chomnue leu mcheasa robsa puok anak daoy trong pitchea ban ttuoloyk kechchasanyea robsa puok anak brasenbae puok anakchea anak mean chomnue men noh

trong chea anak del banhchouh ayeat yeang chbasaleasa towleu khnhom robsa trong( mou ham meat) daembi trong b po ch nh puok anak pi pheap ngngut ( kmean chomnue) towkean pheap phlusveang( mean chomnue) . haey pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha me tda krounea mha anet sraleanh champoh puok anak

tae hetoaveibeanchea puok anak min chamnay nouv tropy sa mb tde knong meakra robsa a l laoh khn del morotk mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei chea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh noh? min smaekna te anak del ban chamnay tropy sa mb tde ning ban thveusangkream mounnung romdaoh tikrong mea kkah knong chamnaom puok anak . anak teangnoh haey kuchea anak del ttuol ban than khpangkhpasa cheang banda anak del ban chamnay tropy sa mb tde ning thveusangkream kraoypi romdaoh tikrong mea kkah . haey a l laoh ban sanyea aoy puokke teangpir krom nouv kar tabasnang da laobrapei( thansuokr) . haey a l laoh doeng chruotachreab nouv avei del puok anak br pru td

bokkol na del aoy a l laoh khchei nouv kamchi muoy da laobrapei ( brichcheak tropy sa mb tde knong meakra a l laoh)noh ku trong nung banthem vea samreab ke vinh te vodng haey ke nung ttuol ban nouv phalbony da thkomthkaeng( thansuokr)

now thngai del anak( mou ham meat) kheunh banda anak mean chomnue brosa ning banda anak mean chomnue srei khn del ponlu puokke phlu chengchang now pimoukh puokke ning now khangosdam puokke( mean ke niyeaytow kan puokke tha) pheap rikreay robsa puok anak now thngainih ku thansuokr del mean t ne l cheachraen haur pi kraom vea daoy puok anak nowknong noh chea amt . noh kuchea chokchy da thomtheng

now thngai del puok poutatbot brosa ning puok poutatbot srei niyeay towkean banda anak del mean chomnue tha saum puok anak cham puok yeung phng daembi puok yeung ttuol ban ponlu robsa puok anakakhleah . ke( mea la ai kat) ban pol tha chaur puok anak tralbtow khangokraoy puok anak vinh haey chaur puok anak svengork ponlu daoyokhluoneng choh . khnnoh ke ban khand rveang puokke( anak mean chomnue ning puok pou tbot) daoy robng del mean tvear muoy now phnek khangoknong vea mean kdei anet sraleanh( thansuokr) haey khangokraw vea vinh ku mean tearounakamm( nork) now kber noh

puokke ban srekhaw anak mean chomnue tha tae puok yeung min thleab rsanow cheamuoy puok anak( nowknong lokey) te ryy? puokke(anak mean chomnue) ban tb vinh tha pitchea thleab menhaey bo nde puok anak ban bamphlanh khluoneng( daoysaar pheap poutatbot robsa puok anak) haey puok anak ban rngcham meul( krohasann kaetlaeng champoh anak mean chomnue) ning ban sangsay ( champoh kar rsa laengvinh) haey karosrameusramei itabrayoch ban baokabrasa puok anak rhaut tealte karkamnt robsa a l laoh ban mokadl( slab) . haey shai t n ban baokabrasa puok anak aoy brasacheak pi meakra robsa a l laoh

dau che neah now thngainih kar lohkhluon min trauv ke ttuol yk pi puok anak( puok poutatbot) ning pi puok del kmean chomnue laey . kanleng robsa puok anak ku thanonork . vea chea kanleng da sakdesam samreab puok anak ning chea kanleng vilotralb da akrak bamphot

tae mintean dlpel samreab banda anak del mean chomnue del chetd robsa puokke torotn tam kar romluk robsa a l laoh ning tam avei del ban banhchouh daoy karpit( kompir kuor an) te ryy? haey komaoy puokke thveu dauch puok( yeahou ti ning na sa r ni) del trauv ban ke phdal kompir aoy kalpimoun aoy saoh haey pelvelea ban kanlong phot pi puokke yeang your ning chetd robsa puokke ban brecha rungrousa . haey puokke pheakochraen kuchea puok del lmeusa nung batobanhchea robsa a l laoh

chaur puok anakdoeng tha pitabrakd nasa a l laoh chea anakathveu aoy phendei rsa( meanchicheate) banteabpi kar slab( kmean chicheate)robsa vea . chea karpit nasa yeung ban banhcheak brab puok anak yeang chbasa nouv phosdo tang cheachraen daembi aoy puok anak svengoyl

pitabrakd nasa banda anak del brichcheaktean brosa ning banda anak del brichcheaktean srei haeyning banda anak del banaoy a l laoh khchei nouv kamchi muoy da laobrapei noh( brichcheak tropy sa mb tde knong meakra a l laoh) trong nung banthem vea samreab puokke vinh te vodng haey puokke nung ttuol ban nouv phalbony da thkomthkaeng( thansuokr)

haey banda anak del mean chomnue leu a l laoh ning anaknoam sar teanglay robsa trong anak teangnoh haey kuchea anak del mean chomnue yeang pitabrakd . haey banda anak del ban pli chivit knong meakra robsa a l laoh puokke nung ttuol ban nouv phalbony robsa puokke ning ponlu da chengchang robsa puokke pi mcheasa robsa puokke . rie puok del kmean chomnue ning ban bdeseth nung phosdo tang teanglay robsa yeung puok teang noh haey kuchea puok nork cheu hi m

chaur puok anakdoeng tha tampit karorsanow knong lokey nih ku kreante chea kar lengsaech ning chea karbaokabrasa ning chea kar loma ning chea amnuot rveang puok anak ning kreante chea kar braneangobracheng now knong tropy sa mb tde ning kaunchaw bonnaoh . ( teangnoh) ku brieb dauchchea tukaphlieng( del ban sraochasrap towleu phendei) del damna robsa vea thveu aoy brachaksekr teanglay penh chetd banteabmk vea ban bre tow chea srapon haey anak nung kheunh vea tow chea pnrlueng vinh ruochamk vea ka klaytowchea kamtech saamream . haey now thngai barlok tearounakamm da thngonthngor( ku samreab puok anak del kmean chomnue) . rie kar aphytosa ning kar ylprom pi a l laoh vinh( ku samreab banda anak del mean chomnue) . haey chivit rsanow knong lokey kmeanoavei krawpi kar te rk traaeal nei karbaokabrasa noh laey

(ao mnoussa lok.) chaur puok anak braneangobracheng knea tow rk kar aphytosa pi mcheasa robsa puok anak ning tow rk thansuokr del ttung robsa vea brieb dauchchea ttung mekh ning phendei delke ban riebcham vea samreab banda anak del mean chomnue leu a l laoh ning anakneasar teang lay robsa trong . teangnih ku chea kar braosa bratan robsa a l laoh del trongbratan vea champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea . haey a l laoh meankar braosa bratan da thomtheng

kmean krohthnak namuoy ban thleak mk leu phendei laey haeyka kmean krohthnak namuoy ban thleak towleu puok anak der leuk leng te ban kttra touk nowknong kompir( lav ho l mah hvou sa) mounnung yeung ban bangkeut vea bonnaoh . pitabrakd nasa teangnoh kuchea kar ngeayosruol bamphot champoh a l laoh

daembi komaoy puok anak meankar pruoybaromph champoh avei del ban batbng pi puok anak haey chaur puok anak kom sabbay huosabraman nung avei delke ban bratan aoy puok anak aoy saoh . haey a l laoh min sraleanh puok del kraeutakratm ning amnuot noh laey
ku puok del kamnanh haey puokke themtang brae mnoussa lok aoy kamnanh tiet . anaknea haey berchenh( pi meakra robsa a l laoh) pitabrakd nasa a l laoh trong mha mean leusalb chea ti kaotasarsaer

chea karpit nasa yeung ban banhchoun banda anakneasar robsa yeung cheamuoynung phosdo tang yeang chbasaleasa haey yeung ban banhchouh cheamuoy puokke nouv kompir ning chonhching you tde thmr daembi aoy mnoussaalok tomneaktomnng knea daoy you tde thmr . haey yeung ban bangkeut aoy mean dek del rung bamphot ning chea brayoch yeang chraen dl mnoussa lok . haey daembi a l laoh doeng tha anaknea mneak del chuoy trong ning banda anakneasar robsa trong daoy athrkambang . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha khlangokla mha khlangpouke

haey chea karpit nasa yeung ban banhchoun nuoh ning ai pr hi m chea anakneasar( towkean krom robsa ke teangpir) haey yeung ban bratan tamneng chea na pi ning bratan kompir aoy kaunchaw robsa ke teangpir . haey knongchamnaom puokke mean anakakhleah ttuol ban kar changaoulobangheanh te puokke pheakochraen chea anak lmeusa nung batobanhchea robsa a l laoh

kraoyomk yeung ban tengtang anakneasar cheachraen banteab pi puokke ning ban tengtang ai sa kaunobrosa robsa mea r yoam haey yeung ban bratan aoy ke nouv kompir ainh chil haey yeung ban dak kdei anet sraleanh ning kdei me tda krounea tow knong chetd robsa banda anak del tam ke( ai sa) . haey puok bopv chit( robsa puok na sa r ni) ban bangkeut vea ( karkorp sakkar) daoyokhluoneng del yeung minban dak katapvokechch vea towleu puokke krawpi chngaoy puokke svengork kar ylprom robsa a l laoh laey te puokke minban theroksaa vea nouv kar theroksaa muoy aoy ban troemotrauv laey . dau che neah yeung kaban bratan aoy banda anak del mean chomnue knongchamnaom puok anak nouv phalbony robsa puokke te puokke pheakochraen lmeusa nung batobanhchea robsa a l laoh

ao banda anak del mean chomnue. chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh haey chaur puok anak mean chomnue leu anakneasar robsa trong ( mou ham meat) trong nung bratan aoy puok anak te v dng nouv kdei me tda krounea robsa trong . haey trong nung bratan aoy puok anak nouv ponlu muoy( kar changaoul bangheanh) del puok anak nung ttuol ban kar changaoulobangheanh tamory vea haey trong nung aphytosa dl puok anak . haey a l laoh mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh

(thveu dau che neah) ku daembi aoy puok aah li kitea b doeng tha pitabrakd nasa puokke kmean samotthaphap leu aveimuoy ampi kar braosa bratan robsa a l laoh laey . haey pitabrakd nasa kar braosa bratan noh ku nowknong kandabdai robsa a l laoh del trong nung bratan vea aoy anak na del trong mean chetnea . haey a l laoh meankar braosa bratan da thomtheng
